heading: This Afternoon
text: Mostly to partly cloudy. Scattered flurries in the southern mountains, and in the north from the Champlain Valley eastward. Highs in the upper 20s to lower 30s south, and mid to upper 20s north, with some lower 20s far north. Northwest winds 5 to 10 mph, gusting to 20 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Clearing, last in the northern mountains. Lows from zero to 10 above, cold spots 5 to 10 below. Winds becoming light and variable.

heading: Friday
text: Mostly sunny. Highs from the mid 20s to around 30, except low to mid 30s in southeastern valleys. Winds becoming west 5 to 10 mph.
